DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that the level of perioperative natriuretic peptides is associated with in-hospital and long term major adverse cardiac events.
DOC.brief_title: Natriuretic Peptides - Predictors of In-hospital and Long-term Major Adverse Cardiac Events After Emergency Surgery?
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of the study is to measure levels of brain natriuretic peptides before and after urgent non-cardiac surgery and to evaluate their predictive value for adverse long-term outcome.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Emergency surgery: 1. Vascular 2. Intraabdominal 3. Orthopedic Patients unable to provide informed consent Thoracic surgery Trauma surgery
